name: City Police Chase Jail Escape: Hard Time Prison Run 3D
name_original: City Police Chase Jail Escape: Hard Time Prison Run 3D
description:
Get ready for the epic police chase game City Police Chase Jail Escape and lockup prisoners behind bars who try to escape Alcatraz prison. Become city police officer on prison guard duty. The gangsters and criminals planning to escape prison. As a top cop run down the prison yard and give criminal a hard time to escape. Live the life of a Police sniper and shoot to arrest gangsters. Give prisoners a hard time to jailbreak and escape maximum security.
Keep patrolling in the prison bus and watch out for the escaped prisoners inmates. Hunt criminals in city streets like a tower watchmen with sniper gun. Fight gangsters and be brutal: hitting with stick and attacking with knife is not enough. Get sniper rifle and shoot criminals armed with machine gun. Enjoy the newest police simulator game with Hard Time Prison Run 3D.


City Police Chase Jail Escape Features:

3 Stunning and detailed Environments
Challenging Criminals chase & Police sniper missions
Two game modes: FPS & 3rd Person Shooting
Thrilling prison escape / jail break mayhem scenario
Multiple Weapons to choose stick, pistol, sniper, machine gun
